Structs in vsip::impl::assignment

Dispatcher<1,LHS,RHS,serial_expr>

Specialization for serial, 1-dimensional assignment.

Dispatcher<2,LHS,RHS,serial_expr>

Specialization for serial, 2-dimensional assignment.

Dispatcher<3,LHS,RHS,serial_expr>

Specialization for serial, 3-dimensional assignment.

Dispatcher<D,LHS,RHS,par_assign<Assign>>

Specialization for parallel assignment, RHS is simple (A = B)

Dispatcher<D,LHS,RHS,par_expr>

Specialization for distributed expressions where the RHS can be reorganized.

Dispatcher<D,LHS,RHS,par_expr_noreorg>

Specialization for distributed expressions that cannot be reorganized.

Dispatcher_helper

Apply a small meta-program to determine the proper tag for handling an assignment:
